--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, Tom Tildrum <tevildoii@y...> wrote:
> Thieves are good as they are... perhaps the high-level
> ones should be given a minimum time limit between
> bombs placed, so they can't lay huge strings of bombs
> all over the map and destroy everything in one fell
> swoop.
> 
> Orc commanders should get upgraded Orc abilities, plus
> giving a boost to all nearby "evil" or "magic"
> creatures. Oh, and yelling for help should actually
> work ; P
>     -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.

First, and least important, it's Orc CAPTAINS.

Now onto the stuff that matters...

I think Orc Captains should at least have Howl from their days as a 
normal Orc. Another good addition would be some sort of Call Orc 
spell, summoning Orcs from nowhere to protect a captain.

Thieves as they are are my favourite class.
